alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla, south central Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Midway. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Telogia, Lake Talquin, Jewel Fire Tower, Hosford, Lowry, Bloxham, Fort Braden and Clio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
